item.title: Cloud Networking Services Extend Business Footprint
item.description:
For businesses with a single office in one city, cloud computing or hosted PBX might suffice, as their communication needs are primarily about connecting to a provider’s cloud. However, companies with multiple locations require cloud networking services to link these sites seamlessly. Cloud networking utilizes public or private networks to connect geographically dispersed locations in various configurations. Examples include the internet, privately managed MPLS networks, and even custom-built networks using leased lines...
